articles.title: Get $40 Off The Logitech G Pro x Superlight 2 Mouse, Today Only
articles.description:
Upgrading your gaming mouse might not make you a crack shot on its own, but it certainly won't hurt. And the Logitech G Pro x Superlight 2 mouse comes in at just 60g and sports plenty of buttons. And even better, it's yours for just $139.99.

articles.title: Musk teases Tesla Roadster demo by year-end. He's been hyping a new one since 2017
articles.description: Tesla's Elon Musk told Joe Rogan that his company is aiming to develop a redesigned version of the Roadster before the end of the year.
articles.content:
Eight years ago, TeslaCEO Elon Musk promoted a next-generation Roadster, basing the name of the sports car on the company's debut electric vehicle from 2008.
